concepts.name: Unit
concepts.description: The number one; the fundamental building block of all numbers.

concepts.name: Number
concepts.description: A multitude composed of units.

concepts.name: Counting
concepts.description: The process of determining the number of elements in a set.

concepts.name: Natural Numbers
concepts.description: The counting numbers: 1, 2, 3, 4, ...

concepts.name: Integers
concepts.description: Whole numbers including negatives: ..., -2, -1, 0, 1, 2, ...

concepts.name: Place Value
concepts.description: The value of a digit based on its position in a number.

concepts.name: Number Systems (Bases)
concepts.description: Different bases for representing numbers (binary, decimal, etc.).

concepts.name: Divisibility
concepts.description: When one number divides another without remainder.

concepts.name: Prime Numbers
concepts.description: Numbers greater than 1 with exactly two divisors: 1 and itself.

concepts.name: Point
concepts.description: That which has no part; a location with no size.

concepts.name: Line
concepts.description: Breadthless length; extends infinitely in both directions.

concepts.name: Angle
concepts.description: The inclination of two lines meeting at a point.

concepts.name: Right Angle
concepts.description: An angle of 90 degrees; when a line stands on another making equal adjacent angles.

concepts.name: Triangle
concepts.description: A polygon with three sides and three angles.

concepts.name: Right Triangle
concepts.description: A triangle with one right angle.

concepts.name: Area
concepts.description: The measure of the size of a two-dimensional surface.

concepts.name: Square
concepts.description: A rectangle with four equal sides and four right angles.

concepts.name: Pythagorean Theorem
concepts.description: In a right triangle, a² + b² = c² where c is the hypotenuse.

concepts.name: Function
concepts.description: A relation that assigns exactly one output to each input.

concepts.name: Polynomial
concepts.description: An expression of variables and coefficients with addition, subtraction, and multiplication.

concepts.name: Quadratic Function
concepts.description: A polynomial of degree 2: f(x) = ax² + bx + c.

concepts.name: Parabola
concepts.description: The graph of a quadratic function; a U-shaped curve.

concepts.name: Number Line
concepts.description: A visual representation of numbers on a straight line.
